text: "Who Will Save Your Soul" is a 1996 song by Jewel and is the leading single to her debut studio album Pieces of You. It went to number 7 in Canada, number 11 in the United States, number 14 in New Zealand and number 27 in Australia. It was nominated for a Grammy Award in 1997. ==Track listings== * US CD and cassette single # "Who Will Save Your Soul" – 4:00 # "Near You Always" – 3:08 * UK, European, and Australian CD single # "Who Will Save Your Soul" – 4:00 # "Pieces of You" – 4:15 # "Emily" – 3:15 * UK cassette single # "Who Will Save Your Soul" – 4:00 # "Emily" – 3:15 == References == Category:1996 songs Category:Debut singles Category:Jewel (singer) songs
title: Who Will Save Your Soul
